![](${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/d7a55038e009acb126c54b88bea74c70.png)

We can take apart $\green{6}$ to make $\pink3$ and $\blue3$.  
We can put together $\pink3$ and $\blue3$ to make $\green{6}$.

question.content:
**Fill in the blanks.**  

 | | |
:-: | :-: | :-:
$6-3=$ [[☃ input-number 1]] | because | [[☃ input-number 2]] $+$ $3=6$
